name: chamberk
text: this is an important strip.  we found out what a robot's ass looks like.

name: cailetshadow
text: A comment left by cailetshadow was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by thomgreenwood, cavebaby, indolent, froggle)

name: courtland
text: Are you forgetting Lyle and Teodor's exclamations?  "It's not funny"?  BOO TO THAT.

name: deimosrising
text: Also of note: Lyle appears to be drinking both from the bottle and a coffee mug. Manly.

name: primal_in_the_mane
text: Nah, when Lyle and T get to watching TV on the couch , they always share the bottle, not the goblet.

name: jhunter
text: the bottle is his version of linus' blanket, it is always with him.

name: roastbeet
text: This feels like one of the earliest strips, maybe because of the double reply in panel 3 and a punchline in panel 4 - just like "Who wants five minutes in the bathroom with the FAO Schwartz catalog?"

name: rotating-dog
text: So true. Perhaps fitting to mark the end of an era, with The Party arc about to change everything and all. Chubbied.

name: magb
text: Lyle and Teodor were wrong to be worried. A robot's ass just looks like this.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: BOO TO THAT

name: a_dude
text: boo. but a classic strip.

name: geysershitdick
text: Lie Bot: would he even lie about his own ass

name: korukyu
text: apparently not?

name: ssddr
text: What use does a robot have for an ass?

name: differentdog
text: everybody poops. everybody.

name: thatskotkid
text: WHY FIND OUT

name: honesttom
text: In Lie Bot's case, so that when his lies are uncovered people can accuse him of talking out of it.

name: senseihollywood
text: apparently a robot's ass looks like a slice of bread

name: chaobell
text: Oh good, I'm glad I'm not the only person who thought so. Lie Bot seriously has Wonder Bread Ass.

name: luckypyjamas
text: that's better than a wonder bread outfit, i suppose

name: mattfish
text: better than Cauliflower Ass

name: deancain29
text: boo, Liebot, boo.

name: gouldgonewild
text: The real mystery of Achewood: Who says, "IT MUST BE", and who says, "WHY FIND OUT"?

name: gompo
text: I think Teodor says "IT MUST BE" and Lyle "WHY FIND OUT".  Lyle doesnt give a shit, he already knows it's bad.  Teodor simply infers that it is bad, and has a much more visceral reaction due to his need to attempt to analyze and understand the world around him.

name: aliiis
text:
I thought it was the other way around, but just because Lyle's speech bubble is slightly higher up than Teodor's in the second panel. However, major respect to you for having actually thought the matter through with regard to each character's attitude and outlook on life.

CHUBBY TO THAT

name: fineoakstructure
text: It's a trick question: Blister said both lines.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Lie bot: Would he even lie about his own ass"

name: garlic_breath
text: This is one of my favorites.

name: atticusonline
text:
it just looks?

it looks just?

name: zem
text: what are you saying

name: scriblerus
text: Sometimes, when I am doing something completely unrelated, I will think of this strip.  And then I will have to explain to people what made me giggle.

name: chewy
text: A bum is a horrible thing to waste. Thank you LB.

name: coco
text: nice ass cleavage, lie bot

name: stuart
text: The strip that spawned a thousand comments in other strips.

name: quarantine
text: This is easily my favorite single strip

name: i_love_kate
text:
Two instances of Lie Bot telling the truth. One, it is indeed time to see his ass, as he proves later. Two, that is indeed how his ass looks.

Unless... That is some kind of false ass, and he has lied on both counts. Hmm...?

name: thegrouch
text: This is probably the first strip that made me laugh out loud.

name: luckypyjamas
text: i miss them playing around inside the television

name: heccibiggs
text: I said "Boo to that" to my manager the other day.

name: tekende
text: And he said "Pack up your fucking desk, hecci! You don't work here anymore!"

name: nyu
text: "Why Find Out?" has been my response to most classes offered at NYU

name: seph
text: One of my favorite strips, period.

name: paby
text: Lyle's mustache used to look like one of those new pizza cutters.

name: arcibi
text: I actually use "boo to that" in conversations because of this strip

name: unalone
text: The day before Achewood changed forever.
